name: places/ChIJ85hf9ehYwokRVYFl5vBm7nI
adrFormatAddress: 1203 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10065-7402, USA

originalText.text:
I have been using Regency Cleaners for a few months now and haven't had any issues. There was a delay in my wash & fold, however, Regency Cleaners explained the situation and made extra efforts to ensure I received my wash & fold. They were extremely nice and professional about it - rare nowadays! Therefore, recommend this place for wash & fold!

I have not brought anything in for tailoring. Just wash and fold and some dry cleaning. A little on the expensive side, but they do deliver for free!

originalText.text:
I would NOT recommend this cleaner to anyone. I received a phone call asking me to come in one of my shirts came in shredded.  I dropped it off Thursday by Saturday its shredded.
I attempted to speak to the almost impossible woman and she tells me its a very old shirt.  I explain I just bought it.  She proceeded to tell me it was a cheap shirt. Um not thinking Ann Taylor is exactly cheap... when I ask what the process of cleaning was she proceeds to tell me its put through a machine.  I said the damage is all on one side this happened within the process... ALL OF A SUDDEN she couldn't understand me...
Please reconsider your decision of bringing anything here....

originalText.text: Dropped a pair of almost new AG pants off here and got them back completely ruined. All of the stretch has been pulled out, possibly from too much heat or whatever chemical was used on them. Cleaners refused to replace and offered to basically steam them which makes no sense. I have been a long time customer here but will not be coming back here, ever. This is not the first thing that they have ruined but it is the first time I have bothered to request reimbursement because of how terrible the condition of the item was. Terrible customer service.

originalText.text:
Regency Cleaners, this is the WORST place to take your clothes to clean.
Mrs. Lanni is a DESPOTIC person.
Regency Cleaners ruined a Down Quilt, they are RUDE, They are NOT able to apologize.  I will never return to this place!.

They fire their workers when someone else offers to work for $50 or more less a week. They have terrible work ethics and should not be an employer.
